post.description:
Upload a file to GCS (Admin only)

- **path**: Destination path in bucket (e.g., "games/test/1.0.0/index.html")
- **file**: File to upload

delete.description:
Delete a file from GCS (Admin only)

- **path**: Path of file to delete (e.g., "games/test/1.0.0/index.html")

get.description:
Get file from GCS (Admin only)

- **path**: File path in bucket (e.g., "games/test/1.0.0/index.html")
- **redirect**: If true, redirect to public URL. If false, return URL as JSON.

post.description:
Delete files from GCS by prefix (Admin only)

**WARNING**: This will permanently delete files!

- **prefix**: Prefix of files to delete (e.g., "games/old-game/")
- **confirm**: Must be true to actually delete. If false, returns dry-run preview.

get.description:
Get GCS bucket information (Admin only)

Returns bucket name, public base URL, and connection status.

Get audit logs (Admin, CTO, CEO only)

- **page**: Page number (default 1)
- **limit**: Items per page (default 50, max 200)
- **userId**: Optional filter by user ID
- **action**: Optional filter by action type
- **gameId**: Optional filter by game ID

Get dashboard statistics (Admin, CTO, CEO only)

Returns:
- Total games and users
- Games by status
- Pending QC and approval counts
- Recent activities count
